entry.title: 'Notcoin' Game to End Mining on April 1—When Is the NOT Token Airdrop?
entry.summary: Telegram-based game Notcoin is ending its coin-tapping "mining phase" in a week. Here's when to expect the NOT token airdrop.

entry.title: Roger Ver Dismisses Adam Back’s Invitation to Return to Bitcoin, Stands Firm on BCH
entry.summary: Roger Ver remains skeptical of layer-2 solutions and doesn't foresee the disparate camps coming together any time soon.

entry.title: ‘Web3 Gaming Sucks’, Says Avalanche, Daring Gamers to Look
entry.summary: Avalanche turned heads at the Game Developers Conference with provocative branding—and flashy games that clashed with it in the best way possible.

entry.title: Crypto Airdrops Are Not Securities, Lawsuit Against SEC Argues
entry.summary: Airdrops involve no investment of money and therefore can’t be securities transactions, asserts the DeFi Education Fund.

entry.title: Content+: A New Model for Media
entry.summary: And you can be part of it. Early signups for beta access are now available.

entry.title: The Elder Scrolls VI Preview: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: UPDATE: Bethesda says that The Elder Scrolls VI is already playable, despite an expected release that's still years away. Here's what we know.

entry.title: SEC to Seek $2 Billion From Ripple Labs, Says Chief Legal Officer
entry.summary: Stuart Alderoty made the preemptive announcement on Twitter on Monday ahead of a court hearing.

entry.title: FTX to Sell Shares in Claude AI Developer Anthropic for $884 Million
entry.summary: FTX will unload 29.4 million Anthropic shares to repay creditors.

entry.title: Coinbase Stock Soars as Bitcoin Blasts Back Above $70,000
entry.summary: COIN has been on a tear this year, now at its highest price since the crypto peak in November 2021.

entry.title: Solana, Avalanche Post Big Gains as Crypto Market Rebounds
entry.summary: Bitcoin is edging back toward the price discovery zone, and altcoins are poised to follow its lead—despite a subdued response from traders.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs, Crypto Funds Lost Nearly $1 Billion Last Week Due to Investor 'Hesitancy'
entry.summary: Investors have pulled cash out of crypto funds such as Grayscale's Bitcoin Trust after seven straight weeks of inflows.

entry.title: Elon Musk Asks Why Vitalik Buterin Left Twitter: Here's the Ethereum Creator's Answer
entry.summary: Vitalik Buterin now favors Farcaster, the decentralized alternative. At ETH Taipei, he explained why he likes it better than Twitter.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Surges Back Above $70,000 With Halving 25 Days Away
entry.summary: Amid halving buzz, Bitcoin flirts with its all-time high after days of losses, surpassing $70,000 early Monday.

entry.title: Trump Meme Coins Fall as Former President Gets Fraud Bond Reduced to $175M
entry.summary: As former U.S. president Donald Trump gets his bond reduced and the deadline extended, Trump meme coin prices are dipping.

entry.title: Bitcoin Is Booming—You Can Earn More by Playing These Free Games
entry.summary: UPDATE: With Bitcoin rising again after its recent all-time high surge, here's an expanded list of games that pay out BTC rewards.

entry.title: Solana Gets New NFT Standard, Metaplex Will Give Fees to DAO for Potential MPLX Rewards
entry.summary: Solana’s new NFT standard is cheaper and more efficient, plus Metaplex is giving half of all-time protocol fees in MPLX to the DAO.

entry.title: Detained Binance Executive Escapes Custody in Nigeria: Report
entry.summary: Binance executive Nadeem Anjarwalla has reportedly escaped detention in Nigeria, as the FIRS filed tax evasion charges against the exchange.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum See 3% Gains as Halving Looms
entry.summary: After sinking as low as $63,000 over the weekend, Bitcoin has rebounded and posted a 3% gain in the past day.

entry.summary: Catch up on this week’s biggest crypto and NFT gaming news and find some weekend reads in our latest roundup.

entry.summary: Over the years, NFT versions of iconic internet memes have netted their creators millions of dollars. Here's the ranking.

entry.title: Here's Every Upcoming Star Wars Game You Shouldn't Miss
entry.summary: There are loads of upcoming games coming from a galaxy far, far away. These are all of the new Star Wars games to watch out for.

entry.summary: Dogwifhat inspired the most expensive meme NFT of all time, as Binance faced ethical questions and the Ethereum Foundation came under legal scrutiny.

entry.title: Design Studio TRAME is Creating ‘Generative Craft’ With Code
entry.summary: TRAME founder Ismail Tazi explained how the design studio is marrying traditional crafts with generative art.

entry.summary: The hottest game on Ethereum scaler Blast wraps up DeFi mechanics and randomness into one FOMO-inducing package.

entry.title: Why Karate Combat Is Risking It All on Crypto
entry.summary: Fight league Karate Combat is built around the KARATE token, letting fans bet on real matches with a "no-loss" format. Here's how it works.

entry.summary: Bilyeu emphasizes blockchain for proving authenticity amidst rising AI-generated deepfakes.

entry.summary: Decentralized confidential computing (DeCC, pronounced Dee-See-See) is the crucial element enabling and securing practical decentralized applications.

entry.summary: All major coins and tokens are down this week, and the sell off hasn't been pretty.

entry.title: SEC Again Delays Decision on Grayscale Ethereum ETF
entry.summary: The ETF application for a futures ETF, like a pending application for a spot ETF, will be in limbo a while longer.

entry.summary: Researchers have revealed a flaw in Apple M1 chips that allows hackers to steal cryptographic keys via CPU manipulation.

entry.title: Orb Eye-Scanning Code Made Open Source by Worldcoin Foundation
entry.summary: By publishing its core technology on GitHub, the group hopes to increase transparency around its "humanness" authentication scheme.

entry.title: Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest Unloads Another $52M in Coinbase Stock
entry.summary: For the second time this month, three ETFs sold COIN, even as the stock has been on a roll.

entry.title: BlackRock Ethereum Fund Wallet Is Swimming in CryptoDickButts and Meme Coins—Why?
entry.summary: A wallet associated with Wall Street giant BlackRock's new on-chain asset fund is receiving many unorthodox—and unsolicited—donations from the crypto community.

entry.title: ETF Outflows Continue
entry.summary: Despite Bitcoin's decline, several alternative cryptocurrencies remain robust. Fantom (FTM) emerges as the top-performing Layer 1 blockchain, while Coinbase introduces futures trading. Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witness a $94 million outflow, although outflows from Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) may decelerate. Approximately $1 billion worth of Bitcoin shorts face liquidation if prices reach $67.8k. Coinbase's premium resurfaces, marking the first occurrence since Bitcoin's all-time high. Bitcoin continues its streak with seven consecutive months of positive performance. Solana's (SOL) decentralized exchange (DEX) achieves a monthly volume of $50 billion, with revenue soaring 30-fold. OKX announces support for a new Solana token standard. Despite expectations, Layer 2 activity remains sluggish post-Dencun, according to Vitalik Buterin.

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin Discusses Ethereum's Dencun Upgrade and More at ETH Taipei 2024
entry.summary: Ethereum creator Vitalik Buterin answers questions from Rug Radio and other media outlets at ETH Taipei 2024. He discusses the recent Dencun network upgrade and a variety of other topics. (Credit: Rug Radio/Decrypt)

entry.title: The Weekend Madness
entry.summary: Bitcoin rebounds as users withdraw funds from exchanges. Solana breaks $200, surpassing Binance Coin to claim the 4th spot in crypto rankings. Ethereum's supply drops to a two-year low. Over $100 million raised by new coin presales in just two days. A dog NFT sells for a staggering $4.3 million. PRIME emerges as the leader in gaming coins, while NodeMonkes flips Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC).

entry.title: BOME Blast off
entry.summary: BTC experiences a 9% drop, resulting in $700 million liquidations, with funding and open interest hitting their lowest levels in weeks. The sell-off appears more sustained compared to previous brief dips, with most BTC downside liquidations concentrated around $66,000. ETFs witness $132 million inflows, sparking predictions of a potential liquidity crisis within six months. VanEck suggests that an ETH ETF could surpass BTC in size. Grayscale's ETH discount doubles within a week. Meanwhile, SOL's market cap reaches an all-time high amid a frenzy surrounding memecoins. Additionally, rumors circulate about a fund losing $1 billion on the BTC-MicroStrategy basis.

entry.title: This is The Time of SOL
entry.summary: ETFs match last week’s inflows in just 3 days. ETH Dencun upgrade goes, ETH coins broadly fall. ETH L2 costs for trading decrease dramatically. SOL nears $100bn FDV as activity soars. SOL DEX volume now 3x ETH mainnet. MicroStrategy plans $500m raise to buy more BTC. Franklin Templeton releases memecoin paper. AEVO faces FUD about tokenomics.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits ATH Again
entry.summary: Bitcoin hits a new high at $73.1k with a 2% increase, while Ethereum remains steady at $4050 and Solana sees a similar surge to $154. TON, RBN, RUNE, and QNT emerge as top gainers, capturing market attention. BTC's unprecedented rise is fueled by a record $1 billion in ETF inflows, coinciding with Ethereum's Dencun upgrade promising significant changes for Layer 2 solutions.

entry.title: CPI COMES IN, BTC HOLDS 72
entry.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) at $72k and Ethereum (ETH) at $4035, both up 1%. Solana (SOL) rises 3% to $152. Leading gains: TON, XRP, IOTA, FLOW. Bitcoin nears record high with significant ETF investments. Solana sees spike in new users. TON surges 30% with Telegram IPO rumors. Ark Invest offloads $69m in Coinbase stock. Predictions: Bitcoin could outdo gold, potentially reaching $150k. Blast platform's value hits $3bn with higher yields. Biden proposes crypto miner tax. El Salvador profits $84m from Bitcoin. Monad plans $200m raise led by Paradigm.

entry.title: BITCOIN HITS $72,000!
entry.summary: BTC hits new ATH of $72k, flips Silver market cap. Wick lower then higher causes $350m liquidations. London Stock Exchange to consider crypto ETNs. Funding again soars before ETF buying begins. Crypto saw record $2.7bn inflows last week. MicroStrategy buys another $821m of BTC.

entry.title: BTC HITS 70K!
entry.summary: ETF net inflows hit $472m in strong week. GBTC outflows hit $10bn, nearly overtaken by new 9. BlackRock to allow more funds to buy BTC ETFs. Rumours still of Qatar buying amid Bukele meeting.

entry.title: Live With Raoul Pal
entry.summary: SOL up 10%, Pantera raising $250m to buy from FTX. Market flat but spot buyers begin to drive volumes.

entry.title: Streamlining Blockchain: Demystifying Real-Time Insights & Simplifying Data Management
entry.summary: Discover how to navigate and overcome the complexities of blockchain data management with QuickNode’s Streams. This webinar, guided by our seasoned experts Nick Yushkevich and Carl DiClementi, provides you with actionable insights into tackling common challenges faced by businesses in the blockchain space. From real-time data streaming that ensures timely decision-making to robust error handling mechanisms that guarantee data integrity, and comprehensive observability features that offer deep insights into your blockchain operations, we’ll cover how QuickNode’s infrastructure is tailored to enhance operational efficiency, scalability, and innovation.

entry.title: DOGS ON TOP!
entry.summary: ETFs see another $562m net inflow. Fear & Greed hits 90, was above for months in 2021. ETH leads majors, beta-plays take lead in altcoins. BlackRock to start buying BTC in its largest fund. MicroStrategy plans $600m capital raise to buy BTC. BTC flips market cap of Silver. WIF to be listed on Binance, rises 20%. PEPE & WIF mentioned on Bloomberg. Alien Punk sells for $16m, ‘NFTs not dead’. 3 more large NFT sales for $500K.

entry.title: Interview: How SocialFi Will Transform Crypto Farming Game 'Pixels'
entry.summary: Pixels founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss how the Ronin-based farming game will be transformed through the addition of guilds and changes to resource generation. They also discuss his ultimate vision for Pixels and his team. Note: This interview was recorded shortly before the PIXEL token launch.

entry.title: Orangie Plays the 'Otherside' Apes Come Home Game Event With His Bored Ape
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie checked out the limited-time "Apes Come Home" event in Otherside, the Bored Ape metaverse game, and got to use his own Ape avatar. Was it worth the $75K he spent for the NFT? Check out his impressions of the experience.

entry.title: 'This is the Age of Creators': How DASTAN is Fixing the 'Broken' Media Industry
entry.summary: Following the launch of decentralized media publishing company DASTAN, its President Farokh Sarmad, CEO Loxley Fernandes, and COO Quinn Button, Ph. D joined Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and The Nifty & BoDoggos Founder and Partner Easy to talk about the future of media.

entry.title: Inside The Mind Of a Web3 Gamer
entry.summary: Saro McKenna, Co-Founder of Alien Worlds, Linda Ang, Head of Strategy at Aelf, and Sami Chlagou, CEO of Cross the Ages joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to explore the profile of the Web3 gamer, the evolving landscape of Web3 gaming and the transition between Web2 and Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Casper Network: Opening a 'New World of Possibilities' Beyond Enterprise Users
entry.summary: Casper Network's Director of Ecosystem Alizee Carli and Head of Content Joe Benso join Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about how the Layer 1 blockchain is expanding beyond its enterprise user base to Web3-native projects.

entry.title: VanEck Web3 Lead: Tokenized Real Estate the 'Holy Grail'
entry.summary: VanEck's Head of NFT Community and Web3, Matt Bartlett, joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss the launch of its new NFT platform Segment.io, and the need for regulatory clarity in the NFT space.

entry.title: Orangie Plays 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged,' the Bored Ape Game With Over $1 Million in Prizes
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie shares a first look at an early version of Dookey Dash: Unclogged, the new free-to-play version of 2023's crypto gaming sensation. Yuga Labs is releasing the new version of the game this spring with over $1 million in prizes up for grabs.

entry.title: How Paris Saint-Germain FC Joined Chiliz as a Validator
entry.summary: Chiliz Chief Strategy Officer Max Rabinovitch joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss Paris Saint-Germain FC joining its network as a validator, and how consequential Web3 adoption in sport will come from the grassroots.
